ai-tha-ap349:1.3_0: A Buddha is the name of a Buddha,
ai-tha-ap349:1.4_0: like a open air in the open air.
ai-tha-ap349:2.2_0: I threw a fleezing in the past.
ai-tha-ap349:2.3_0: I’ve given a gift by myself,
ai-tha-ap349:2.4_0: not to be reborn again and again.
ai-tha-ap349:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap349:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap349:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Padumavatī.
ai-tha-ap349:6.1_0: Padumuttara, the seventh Elders (permission) to the seventh,
